duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic leadership and direction to all operational departments within the organization.
Identify opportunities for process improvement and implement strategies to enhance operational efficiency.
Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to measure the performance of various operational areas.
Participate in the development and execution of the company's strategic plans and initiatives.
Foster collaboration and alignment across different departments and functions within the organization.
Identify and manage operational risks and develop strategies to mitigate potential threats to the company's operations.
Build and lead a high-performing operational team.
Interact with various stakeholders and represent the company in external forums.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
